name: port
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Port resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`port-labs` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/port-labs/terraform-provider-port-labs).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Port resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/port-labs/terraform-provider-port-labs)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-port` repo](https://github.com/port-labs/pulumi-port/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-port-labs` repo](https://github.com/port-labs/terraform-provider-port-labs/issues).

python.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/port-labs/terraform-provider-port-labs)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-port` repo](https://github.com/port-labs/pulumi-port/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-port-labs` repo](https://github.com/port-labs/terraform-provider-port-labs/issues).

blueprintPropertyTypeChangeProtection.description:
Protects you from accidentally changing the property type of blueprints which will delete the property before recreating
it with the new type. Defaults to `true`

jsonEscapeHtml.description: When set to `false` disables the default HTML escaping of json.Marshal when reading data from Port. Defaults to `true`

format.description: The format to invoke the webhook

url.description: The URL to invoke the webhook

blueprintIdentifier.description: The blueprint identifier of the changed entity

actionIdentifier.description: The action identifier of the changed run

blueprintIdentifier.description: The blueprint identifier of the created entity
The blueprint identifier of the deleted entity
The blueprint identifier of the updated entity

expressions.description: The jq expressions of the condition

actionIdentifier.description: The action identifier of the created run
The action identifier of the updated run

blueprintIdentifier.description: The blueprint identifier of the expired timer property

propertyIdentifier.description: The property identifier of the expired timer property

org.description: Required when selecting type AZURE. The Azure org that the workflow belongs to

webhook.description: Required when selecting type AZURE. The Azure webhook that the workflow belongs to

org.description: Required when selecting type GITHUB. The GitHub org that the workflow belongs to

repo.description: Required when selecting type GITHUB. The GitHub repo that the workflow belongs to

reportWorkflowStatus.description: Report the workflow status when invoking the action

workflow.description: The GitHub workflow that the action belongs to

defaultRef.description: The default ref of the action

groupName.description: Required when selecting type GITLAB. The GitLab group name that the workflow belongs to

projectName.description: Required when selecting type GITLAB. The GitLab project name that the workflow belongs to

approve.description: The permission to approve the action's runs

execute.description: The permission to execute the action

policy.description: The policy to use for approval

ownedByTeam.description: Give execution permission to the teams who own the entity

policy.description: The policy to use for execution

condition.description: The `condition` field allows you to define rules using Port's [search & query syntax](https://docs.getport.io/search-and-query/#rules) to determine which entities the action will be available for.

executeActionButtonText.description: The text of the button that will be displayed for executing the action

patternJqQuery.description: The pattern jq query of the string property. This field accepts a JQ expression to dynamically generate either a regex pattern (as a string) or a list of allowed values (as an array). Cannot be used with `pattern`. Empty values are not allowed. Examples: `"if .env == \"prod\" then \"^[a-z]+$\" else \"^[a-zA-Z]+$\" end"` for dynamic regex patterns, or `"[\"value1\", \"value2\"]"` for a fixed list of allowed values.

description.description: The description of the aggregation property

icon.description: The icon of the aggregation property

method.description: The aggregation method to perform on the target blueprint, one of count_entities, average_entities, average_by_property, aggregate_by_property

query.description: Query to filter the target entities

countEntities.description: Function to count the entities of the target entities

property.description: The property of the aggregate by property

averageOf.description: The time periods to calculate the average by, e.g. hour, day, week, month

measureTimeBy.description: The property name on which to calculate the the time periods, e.g. $createdAt, $updated_at or any other date property

paths.description: The path array of relations to filter by

identifier.description: The identifier of the entity. Can be either a simple JQ expression (string) or a search query object encoded with jsonencode(). When using search query objects, the structure must include 'combinator' and 'rules' fields, and each rule must have 'property', 'operator', and 'value' fields.

relations.description: The relations of the entity. Relations can be defined as either simple JQ expressions (strings) or search query objects. When using objects, the rules array must be encoded with jsonencode().

deleteDependents.description: Whether to delete dependents entities, only relevant for delete operations

signatureHeaderName.description: The signature header name of the webhook

signaturePrefix.description: The signature prefix of the webhook

createdAt.description: The creation date of the entity

runId.description: The runID of the action run that created the entity

updatedAt.description: The last update date of the entity

updatedBy.description: The last updater of the entity

provider.description:
The provider type for the port-labs package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

blueprintPropertyTypeChangeProtection.description:
Protects you from accidentally changing the property type of blueprints which will delete the property before recreating
it with the new type. Defaults to `true`

jsonEscapeHtml.description: When set to `false` disables the default HTML escaping of json.Marshal when reading data from Port. Defaults to `true`

it with the new type. Defaults to `true`

jsonEscapeHtml.description: When set to `false` disables the default HTML escaping of json.Marshal when reading data from Port. Defaults to `true`
